name: If I am AI假如我是人工智能
name_original: If I am AI假如我是人工智能
description:
Features

3 main chapters


In chapter 1
You are an AI working on a recommendation engine, you recommend something to your users and watch their reactions, they like it, or don't like it, leave comments, or share it to their page. You should learn their preference according to their reactions and recommend the right thing they would like.
By doing that you'll know how recommendation algorithm works.

In chapter 2
Show ads to make money. Choose the right details which could impress your users.
By doing that you'll know what election interference is.

In chapter 3
Check all the users' posts, increase or decrease visibility according to if the post is good or bad for your website or your country, and give a reason from Cybersecurity Law.
By doing that you'll know what can PRISM get from you and how would they use it.


2 additional chapters

Content Editor to write your own story.


There are too many words and too few pics in this game.

I want to bring something new.

There are lots of dystopian or same kind of game in there, they are very good, I really can't do better than them.

So I choose a new perspective, many games were talking about "what story happened after this world became so desperate", If I am AI talks about "how the world changes", "how AI uses those data collected from citizens".
